text: Ra juna dina allahale tiniharula'i (aphu samaksa) ekatrita garnecha tyasadinako smarana gara'unus ki tiniharula'i yasto mahasusa hunecha jasto ki dinako eka ghantabhanda badhi tyaham thi'enan (ra) apasama eka arkala'i cinna ubhi'eka chan. Juna manisaharule allahako agadi upasthita hune kuro jhutha bhane, tiniharu ghatama parihale ra tiniharu sahi bato pa'una sakenan
